name: Just Chaos
description:
A Game Made in 7 Days IN Brackeys-6 gamejam.

You're a cube from an experiment to get rid of you with some radioactive material, but you woke up and found yourself in a few obstacles, but you have to use your new power to get over it, causing chaos to get out of the dark world. the game may have some issues but i uploaded it 5 mins before the deadline the 32 bit version have some issues. i will solve it soon.
